net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
Class McCabe

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.Calculator
        |
        +--net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.McCabe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, ICalculator
public class McCabe
extends Calculator
implements Constants

Calculate McCabe Cyclomatic Complexity for a method. This counts the number of if, while, for, case, do, catch, and ?: occurences plus one.

Author:
Frank Sauer
